original_text:
But all the descendants of Israel
    will find deliverance in the Lord
    and will make their boast in him.
korean_text: 이스라엘 자손은 다 여호와로 말미암아 의롭다 함을 얻고 자랑하리라 하느니라

sentences.original_text: But all the descendants of Israel
will find deliverance in the Lord
and will make their boast in him.
